data.name: mock Fair Isle Snowflake Lumbar Cushion Cover

mainimage.alt: Fair Isle Snowflake Lumbar Cushion Cover

data.short_description: Keeping a distinctive complex pattern without being complicated involves choosing a simple palette. The poinsettia red and ivory white in this cushion cover are two lovely colors that we enjoy all season long. The sweater-like snowflake design celebrates more than one type of holiday (reverse is sherpa-like sheepskin). Make it a snow day. The front is made of 100% yarn-dyed acrylic; It is reversed to 100% recycled polyester sherpa in white. Yarn dyed fabric has amazing vivid colors that keep their radiance over time. Holds 16 "x 26" fill (sold separately).

The front is made of 100% yarn-dyed acrylic; It is reversed to 100% recycled polyester sherpa in white. Yarn dyed fabric has amazing vivid colors that keep their radiance over time. Holds 16 "x 26" fill (sold separately).

Machine wash cold, inside out, on delicate cycle. Use only non-chlorine bleach, if necessary. Tumble dry on low temperature, remove immediately. Use warm iron as needed.

data.name: Desk Lamp Ezra
data.short_description: Craftsmanship and practical functionality come together in our eye-catching accent lamp. Crafted from tough ceramic with gently curved contours, Ezra is hand finished with a reactive glaze that imparts a rich, varied tone and unique character. Made of ceramic with a reactive Teal Glazed finish applied by hand. Pluggable. The lamp has an on / off switch located in the socket. Transparent PVC cord. UL Listed Dry. It has capacity for 1 bulb type A of 60 W or equivalent to LED (not included). E26 plug.

data.name: Bathrobe Disney Mickey Mouse
data.short_description: Brighten up your space with the all-magic mascot: Disney's Mickey Mouse. And we don't just mean decoration. Why not pay tribute to one of the world's most famous people with this hooded robe complete with Mickey ears.

description.text: Brighten up your space with the all-magic mascot: Disney's Mickey Mouse. And we don't just mean decoration. Why not pay tribute to one of the world's most famous people with this hooded robe complete with Mickey's ears.

data.name: Plato Forest Gnome Christmas Tree
data.short_description: There is no gnome place home this holiday season. Illustrating a fairytale forest scene, the art in this collection was originally painted by our in-house design team to add a touch of winter magic to your meals. The tree-shaped platter cheerfully features hors d'oeuvres, salads and side dishes, colorful treats, and more.

data.name: Set of 4 Larkin Bowls
data.short_description: Taking a fresh approach to traditional ceramic traditions, our elegant Larkin dinnerware collection highlights its artisan sensibility with a reactive glaze and rustic appeal. In iconic coupe designs, each tonal beauty features distinctly variegated hues and enamel patterns. From this dynamic design come our refined and rustic soup bowls, which adorn a table rich in tone and texture.

description.text: Taking a fresh approach to traditional ceramic traditions, our elegant Larkin dinnerware collection highlights its artisan sensibility with a reactive glaze and rustic appeal. In iconic coupe designs, each tonal beauty features distinctly variegated hues and enamel patterns. From this dynamic design come our refined and rustic soup bowls, which adorn a table rich in tone and texture.

specs.spec_value: Made from stoneware with a matte glazed finish. Free of phthalates, BPA, lead and latex. Capacity: 370 ml

data.name: Shiny Hammered Cutlery Set
data.short_description: The meticulous finish gives this cutlery collection an original and elegant look, perfect for your table. Includes salad fork, carving fork, knife, soup spoon, and coffee spoon. Crafted from 18/10 stainless steel that will stay sharp and shiny for years to come.

description.text: The meticulous finish gives this cutlery collection an original and elegant look, perfect for your table. Includes salad fork, carving fork, knife, soup spoon, and coffee spoon. Crafted from 18/10 stainless steel that will stay sharp and shiny for years to come.

data.name: Grayton Armchair
data.short_description: Inclined arm. The cushions are not removable. The kiln-dried, corner-locked rubber wood frame provides exceptional structural integrity.

description.text: Inclined arm. The cushions are not removable. The kiln-dried, corner-locked rubber wood frame provides exceptional structural integrity. Kiln-dried wood helps prevent warping, splitting, cracking, and the development of mold. Premium quality, aniline dyed. The skin will soften and clear with use and the passage of time, developing an elegant patina. Leather is a natural product. Variations in color and texture are inherent to each skin; no two pieces are exactly alike. The cushion is supported by steel springs that do not sag. Fixed legs have a natural distressed finish. Polyester wrapped cushions for a firmer feel.

data.name: Recycled Sea Glass
data.short_description: Inspired by the sun-bleached look of sea glass, our collection evokes a casual seaside sensibility. Crafted from recycled glass with an organic texture, these drinking glasses feature a translucent finish...

description.text: Inspired by the sun-bleached look of sea glass, our collection evokes a casual seaside sensibility. Crafted from recycled glass with an organic texture, these drinking glasses feature a translucent finish with delicate bubbles to provide visual dimension. Ideal for backyard barbecues or poolside parties, they add a quintessential look to summer entertaining.

data.name: Duvet Willow
data.short_description: Oeko-Tex Certified, the definitive mark of excellence for products that are healthy for you and the environment. The duvet features a concealed button closure with internal ties that keep the padding in place. Pre-washed for a super soft touch feeling.

description.text: Oeko-Tex Certified, the definitive mark of excellence for products that are healthy for you and the environment. The duvet features a concealed button closure with internal ties that keep the padding in place. Pre-washed for a super soft touch feeling.

data.name: Luna Gold Cutlery Set
data.short_description: East meets West in the design of the elegant handles of our Luna cutlery, which have a cross-section with rounded corners, similar to toothpick designs. The spoons and forks are made of stainless steel. The knife is made of stainless steel. Each piece is handcrafted and polished upon completion. Set of 5.

data.name: Dream King Size Sheet Set
data.short_description: Made from 100% organic cotton satin brushed for supreme softness, our Dream bedding has a luxurious, silky feel. The sheet set has a versatile color palette that favors layering for a stylish bed. And you can rest easy knowing that each component is made with the environment in mind. Sweet Dreams. Made from 100% organic cotton satin. Organic cotton is grown without the use of persistent pesticides and synthetic fertilizers. Fair Trade Certified ‚Ñ¢. Purchasing this product helps ensure fair and safe work practices, improve livelihoods, and empower workers to invest in their communities.

data.name: Disney Mickey Mouse Soap Dispenser
data.short_description: Brighten up your space with the all-magic mascot: Disney's Mickey Mouse. When you need an easy (and adorable) upgrade, our black stoneware soap or lotion dispenser, complete with a portrait of one of the world's most famous characters, is perfect for your dressing table.
